body_html:
I talked to Andrew offline and it sounds like due to internal API differences, this change sort of has to be completely done differently, and Andrew has decided to take this on, so I'm going to close this PR.

I wish I had a better answer for you, but the TF team doesn't control the NDK versions that are built inside all of Google, so the best we can do is do the work required to solve this problem for you.

body:
I talked to Andrew offline and it sounds like due to internal API differences, this change sort of has to be completely done differently, and Andrew has decided to take this on, so I'm going to close this PR.

I wish I had a better answer for you, but the TF team doesn't control the NDK versions that are built inside all of Google, so the best we can do is do the work required to solve this problem for you.
